metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11759 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in OpenEXR before 2.4.1. Because of integer overflows in CompositeDeepScanLine::Data::handleDeepFrameBuffer and readSampleCountForLineBlock, an attacker can write to an out-of-bounds pointer.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> can't locate changes to readSampleCountForLineBlock, need to check if list of commits is complete

criterions.comment: openexr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
